channel.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
channel.description:
kk. so for the past 20 mins ive been trying to make a dragon trident out of primitives. i need some help on what i should do with the base of it that i got. here's the pics:
[IMG]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb76/jaloko88/trident.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb76/jaloko88/dragontridentWF.png[/img]
its no where neer finished. right now and im having artiest block =p. and just wondering what i should do with it and gimmeh some constructive ideas. color scheme and so on.
Notes: this isent a "I like it" "I don't like it" thing. I'm asking for help. A true artiest doesn't care what another person thinks =p
Plus this is my first time doing this kind of stuff in a computer i usaly draw things out on paper =p. this trident looked better in my head but ill make it look cool soon. its nice so far..just want some help =]

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Where did this forum go? :3
I know you guys can do better!

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

Again Its not finished XD. im just looking for ideas on its shape and so on. not saying that THIS is what it will look like. i said i have a primitive BASE not an actual model =p

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

jaloko:

Traceing is boring. ull get no where doing that =p. im trying to use primitives. and when you trace you tend to use more polygons. and yes the rings will be spinning when im finished.

You use the rope/rectange tool to select the bottom on the point’s bottoms and then you click on scale tool and use the proportional square and scale it. I didn’t want you to trace.

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“jaloko, post:5, topic:354049”]Traceing is boring. ull get no where doing that =p. im trying to use primitives. and when you trace you tend to use more polygons. and yes the rings will be spinning when im finished.[/quote]Sorry but you don’t have to trace to get that kind of shape try using the Knife tool, primitive modelling isn’t just making primitives and putting them together…

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

It looks a little off for a trident. You should follow one of these pics and go with the more classic “well known” trident head.


Read full topic

item.source: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model

item.title: Dragon trident. Need some ideas on model
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Draw a picture to go off of when modelling And make the adjustment from spear to spear point more fluid. And make the bases of those points not soo big. And create a little like dips for handles in the spear handle part. I’ll get a picture if you need to know what I mean. And I don’t really get the feel for those rings, they are supported in midair by what? Magic?

Read full topic
